Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the appointment of certain police officers
Summary: Provides that the maximum age requirement of 35 years for police officers to take a competitive examination shall not apply to any police officer of any county, city, town or village police force not otherwise provided for in this section if such officer is a part-time police officer in a non-competitive position and is vested in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system.
LawCode: Amd ยง58, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the appointment of certain police officers
